CustomField.description: A hidden field to be used as part of a workflow when a Contact needs to be resubscribed to Eloqua campaigns due to an email address being changed, didn't opt out, etc
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A hidden field to be used as part of a workflow when a Contact needs to be resubscribed to Eloqua campaigns due to an email address being changed, didn't opt out, etc
CustomField.label: Resubscribe to Eloqua?
